---
category: news
title: "Tesla will make sure you are a good driver before giving you access to Full Self-Driving Beta"
excerpt: "Elon Musk said that Tesla will use its telemetry data to make sure customers are “good” drivers before allowing them to access its Full Self-Driving Beta software. This is a tricky situation since those customers already paid for the software."
